addVariantForExperiment(String, String) - Static method in class com.artisan.incodeapi.ArtisanExperimentManager
Add a variant to an in-code experiment with Artisan.
ArtisanBlock - Interface in com.artisan.powerhooks
Implement this interface to define an Artisan Power Hook Block.

Use PowerHookManager.registerBlock(String, String, Map, ArtisanBlock) to register this block with Artisan.

Then, once you connect to Artisan Tools for the first time you can dynamically modify the data that is used by this block from Artisan Tools.

This block will be invoked when you call PowerHookManager#executeBlock(String, Map, Context) in your app.
ArtisanExperimentManager - Class in com.artisan.incodeapi
Manages all in-code experiments designed for use with Artisan.
ArtisanManager - Class in com.artisan.manager
Initializes Artisan and manages its lifecycle.

ArtisanTrackingManager - Class in com.artisan.incodeapi

P

PowerHookBlock - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Represents an Artisan Power Hook Block.

A PowerHookBlock has an ArtisanBlock you would like to use in your app with data that is configurable from Artisan Tools.

You don't need to instantiate this class yourself, but will see instances of this if you call PowerHookManager.getAllBlocks().
PowerHookBlock() - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookBlock
 
PowerHookBlock(String, Map<String, String>, ArtisanBlock) - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookBlock
 
PowerHookManager - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Manages all Power Hooks used with Artisan.
PowerHookVariable - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Represents an Artisan Power Hook Variable.

A PowerHookVariable is a variable you would like to use in your app whose value is configurable from Artisan Tools.

You don't need to instantiate this class yourself, but will see instances of this if you call PowerHookManager.getAllVariables().
PowerHookVariable() - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookVariable
 
PowerHookVariable(String, String) - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookVariable
